text:
e="preserve">Christopher David Killip (11 July 1946 – October 2020) was a Manx photographer. He worked at Harvard University in Cambridge, Massachusetts, from 1991 to 2017, as a Professor of Visual and Environmental Studies. Killip was well known for his black and white images of people and places. He was born in Douglas, Isle of Man.
Killip died in October 2020 at the age of 74.
